about_the_game:
Captain Buttface is the superhero we all need and want, he is here, so bow down to our saviour. Captain Buttface is a platforming adventure game where you take control of Captain Buttface himself and fight off any foes who stand in his way. Take control of Captain Buttface and fight and traverse through a bodacious range of diverse levels and save the universe once again.

Use Captain Buttfaces incredible hand to hand combat skills to take on a myriad of dangerous foes, feel the power that Captain Buttface holds between his butt cheeks as he majestically performs incredible martial arts moves in a fluent and captivating style reminiscent of the great Butt Lord himself.

KEY FEATURES
  • Test your skill and reflexes!
  • Full of exciting and challenging gameplay!
  • Awesome hand to hand combat!
  • Take control of the saviour of the universe Captain Buttface!
  • Overcome Captain Buttface's enemies and save the universe!
  • Explore the rich and interesting world of Buttland!
  • Unlock Amazing Abilities

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
